Translations.Text: Em
Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uo Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep, ar lajel ipwassnen. Wid ijehlen numren ayen u$uo pwanedoen

Ini: "day ur twalam ara wigi u$uo la tepnujum, war Oebbi? Sseknet iyi d, d acu xelqen si tmurt, ne$ ma saan amur deg igenwan? Awit iyi d tazmamt id izwaren tagi, ne$ lateo n tmusni, ma tessawalem tidep
Anwa innetlafen sennig wid ipnujun, war Oebbi, $eo wayen ur asen d nepparra, ar ass n tnekra, u nitni stehzan deg unuju nnsen
Mara twafesrem imdanen, ad ilin d icenga nnsen, ad skiddben aabad nnsen
Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, wid iugin tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "wagi d sseur n uuee

Ne$ ad inin: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "lemmer it id snulfa$, ur tezmirem ad iyi tsellkem, s wacemma, si Oebbi. Neppa, Yif akw akken Issen, acu teekkum fellas. Iqadd Neppa d Anagi gari yidwen. Neppa, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ini: "ur lli$, ger imazanen, d win id isnulfuyen. Ur eoi$ acu ara ivoun yidi, ne$ yidwen. La iiafaoe$, kan, ayen iyi d ippuweeean. Aql i, kan, nek, d aneddao ipbegginen
Ini: "meyyzet ma, ayagi, s$uo Oebbi, u tnekoem t? Icehhed unagi n At Isoail, $ef lmetl is, d$a iumen. Tesme$wrem iman nnwen". Ih, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "lemmer d ayen ilhan, ur a$ zeggwiren $uoes". Imi ur pwanhan ara syis, qqaoen: "ayagi d tikerkas n zik
Uqbel is, Tazmamt n Musa, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Tagi d Tazmamt itebbiten, s wawalen n taaoabt, a ppendeo wid idensen, a ppessefoee lauuam
Ih, wid iqqaoen: "Mass nne$ d Oebbi, d$a ifen degs, ur ppagaden, ur $weblen
Widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen, d arraz n wayen xeddmen

Nweuua amdan ar lewqama s imawlan is. Imma s temeen s tadist, temeen di tinnufra. Ger tadist akked ujumi, caret wagguren. Armi ibbwev d anqaqoi, issawev kueet isegwasen, inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi a K snemmre$ af l$it i $ T$atev, nek akked lwaldin iw; ad xedme$ ayen ilhan ara K ioavin. Efk iyi d tarwa ilhan. Aql i utube$ K, aql i seg imvuaen
£uo wigi, Nqebbel lmefruz igiten nnsen, a Nessuref i tucmitin nnsen, ger at Loennet; d lemaahda n tidep, i sen ippuwaaaden

Win innan i imawlan is: "tfuh nnwen! Day yi taahdem a d kkre$? Ni$ aaddan isuta uqbel i". Nitni teppren tacvai n Oebbi: "a ssexv ik, amen! Ih, lmaahda n Oebbi, d tidep". A d yini: "ayagi, siwa tiekayin imezwura
D wigi i$ef iuao wawal iaanan leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i ten id izwaren. Ih, nitni d imexsuoen
I akw tiseddarin n wayen xedmen, iwakken ad yili warraz igiten nnsen. Nitni ur pwadensen

Ass ideg ara kecmen ar tmes, wid ijehlen: "tvegaam tieidanin i s tezham, di tmeddurt nnwen di ddunit. Assa, a ppeppuqeiiim s uaaqeb isdullun, imi tessem$waoem iman nnwen di tmurt, ur teklalem; imi tellam tbe$wlem
